issue.title: [R] Follow DictionaryType/DictionaryArray changes from ARROW-3144
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5361](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5361). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The R build is broken until this work is done. See <https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/533775912#L3021-L3235> for the error.

comments.body:
